user_persona: A farmer looking to stay informed on the latest agricultural trends and advice.
user_goal: Browse through the latest agricultural news articles.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting News Page
narrative_steps.description: Maria navigates to the news section to catch up on recent developments in agriculture.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to `/news` route.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A list of news cards with thumbnails, titles, summaries, and publication dates is displayed against a light cyan background.

narrative_steps.title: Hovering Over Article
narrative_steps.description: She sees an interesting headline and hovers over the card to get a better look.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over a news card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The card slightly elevates and gains a subtle shadow effect for emphasis.

narrative_steps.title: Reading Full Article
narrative_steps.description: Convinced by the summary, Maria clicks the article to read more.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the selected news card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The user is redirected to the full article view page.

user_persona: A buyer interested in sourcing fresh produce locally.
user_goal: View detailed information about specific farm products.

narrative_steps.title: Browsing Product Catalog
narrative_steps.description: John visits the product catalog to explore available farm goods.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to `/products` route.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A grid layout of products appears with images, names, categories, and brief descriptions on a light cyan background.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Product Details
narrative_steps.description: He notices some organic vegetables and wants to know more about them.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a vegetable product card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A modal opens showing extended details like origin, availability status, and full description.

user_persona: A crop planner preparing planting schedules based on upcoming weather.
user_goal: Check local weather forecasts relevant to farming activities.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Weather Dashboard
narrative_steps.description: Emily goes to the weather dashboard to plan her week's farming tasks.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to `/weather` route.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A dashboard displaying temperature, humidity, precipitation chance, wind speed, and UV index is shown with icons and themed styling.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Location Manually
narrative_steps.description: She wants to verify conditions for another farm located nearby.
narrative_steps.action: Manually input a different location into the location field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The displayed weather data updates dynamically based on the entered location using the integrated weather API.

user_persona: A researcher gathering data on sustainable farming practices.
user_goal: Find specific agricultural news and product information quickly.

narrative_steps.title: Using Search Bar
narrative_steps.description: David uses the search bar to find resources related to organic fertilizers.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'organic fertilizer' into the search bar located at the top navigation.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Auto-suggestions appear below the input field sourced dynamically from the search endpoint.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Search Query
narrative_steps.description: After typing his query, he submits it to see results.
narrative_steps.action: Press Enter or click the search button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to a results page listing matching items from both news and products.

requirement_tested: Filter options for news and products
user_persona: A vendor organizing inventory for seasonal sales.
user_goal: Narrow down product listings to only currently available items.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Filter Dropdown
narrative_steps.description: Sarah needs to sort products by availability before updating her store shelves.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Availability' dropdown menu above the product list.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dropdown options become visible with the dropdown arrow icon rotating downward.

narrative_steps.title: Applying Availability Filter
narrative_steps.description: She selects 'In Stock' to focus on available products.
narrative_steps.action: Select 'In Stock' from the dropdown options.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The product list instantly updates to show only available items without reloading the page.

user_persona: A frequent visitor who prefers a calming interface for reading long articles.
user_goal: Enjoy a visually consistent and soothing browsing experience.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating Any Page
narrative_steps.description: Robert browses the site regularly and always appreciates the clean aesthetic.
narrative_steps.action: Visit any page such as `/news` or `/products`.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All sections and containers maintain a consistent light cyan (#E0FFFF) background color.

requirement_tested: Cadet blue color scheme for UI elements
user_persona: A web designer evaluating UI consistency across platforms.
user_goal: Verify that interactive elements use a unified cadet blue theme.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting With Buttons
narrative_steps.description: While reviewing the site, Alex inspects the visual design of buttons and links.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over any primary button such as 'Submit' or 'Search'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Button darkens slightly while maintaining accessible contrast standards.

user_persona: A student researching agricultural advancements for coursework.
user_goal: Read older news articles beyond the first page.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Additional Articles
narrative_steps.description: Jamie scrolls to the bottom of the news feed and wants to see earlier posts.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Next' arrow in the pagination controls.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: New batch of articles loads via AJAX call, replacing the previous set.

user_persona: A chef exploring new ingredients for restaurant dishes.
user_goal: Compare detailed specifications of various dairy products.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Product Details Modal
narrative_steps.description: Chef Martinez clicks on several dairy items to compare origins and pricing.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a dairy product card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A modal overlay opens showing expanded product information.

user_persona: A regional coordinator monitoring multiple farms’ weather risks.
user_goal: Update forecast data manually after noticing discrepancies.

narrative_steps.title: Refreshing Forecast Data
narrative_steps.description: Tom suspects outdated data may affect irrigation planning decisions.
narrative_steps.action: Click the manual refresh button on the weather dashboard.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Latest forecast data replaces old entries seamlessly within the UI via API integration.

requirement_tested: User interface with consistent color styling
user_persona: A UX consultant auditing cross-page style uniformity.
user_goal: Confirm visual consistency of theme across all device sizes.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Across Devices
narrative_steps.description: Lisa checks whether the theme remains intact during responsive resizing.
narrative_steps.action: Resize browser window between desktop, tablet, and mobile breakpoints.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: UI components retain correct light cyan backgrounds and cadet blue accents across all screen sizes.

user_persona: An editor responsible for publishing daily agricultural updates.
user_goal: Publish a newly written article about soil health.

narrative_steps.title: Drafting New Article
narrative_steps.description: Emma logs into the admin panel to submit today’s featured piece.
narrative_steps.action: Fill out article metadata including title, summary, content, and upload an image.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Form fields accept structured input and validate required entries properly.

narrative_steps.title: Saving and Publishing
narrative_steps.description: Once satisfied with the draft, she publishes it immediately.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Publish' button to save the article.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Article gets stored in the database and becomes publicly visible on the news page.

user_persona: A grocery chain buyer sourcing bulk supplies.
user_goal: Quickly locate grain products suitable for wholesale purchase.

narrative_steps.title: Toggling Category Tags
narrative_steps.description: Mark needs to filter exclusively by grains for large-volume procurement.
narrative_steps.action: Toggle the 'Grains' category tag in the sidebar filter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Only grain-type products remain visible in the product listing area.

user_persona: A precision agriculture specialist tracking live environmental changes.
user_goal: Monitor live atmospheric updates affecting crop growth cycles.

narrative_steps.title: Waiting for Auto-Refresh
narrative_steps.description: Dr. Lee relies on minute-by-minute updates for research accuracy.
narrative_steps.action: Wait passively for configured interval duration to elapse.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: New weather readings automatically replace outdated values in the dashboard UI.

requirement_tested: Responsive design for all device sizes
user_persona: A mobile-first user accessing farm tips on-the-go.
user_goal: Access the same features and readability on a smartphone as on desktop.

narrative_steps.title: Resizing Browser Window
narrative_steps.description: While traveling, Olivia tests how well the layout adapts to smaller screens.
narrative_steps.action: Reduce browser window size below 768px breakpoint.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout adjusts to stacked column format with proportional scaling of fonts and elements.
